description technical detail:
NEC MultiSync PA241W-BK - 24" -LED Backlit LCD Monitor
Tackle even your most demanding color-critical projects with the 24.1" NEC MultiSync PA241W, a widescreen LCD display ideal for graphics/photography applications. This model, which touts a dynamic design, wide color gamut, 14-bit 3D LUT, eco-conscious features, high brightness and many cutting-edge technologies, has created a high benchmark for accurate, consistent and repeatable color performance.
features: Picture in picture, CableComp, Ambix, AutoBright, power off timer, TileMatrix, NaViSet, ColorComp, AmbiBright, Eco-Mode, Overdrive technology
interfaces: VGA ¦ 2 x DVI-D ¦ DisplayPort ¦ USB 2.0 upstream
